${ModID}:Seed.NAME: Seed
DESCRIPTION: #yPassive: Add #b{0} #yGrowing #yPain, then deals that much damage to a random enemy. NL #yEvoke: Removes all #yGrowing #yPain and deals that much damage to ALL enemies.

#yPassive: Add #b{0} #yGrowing #yPain [REMOVE_SPACE], then deals that much damage to a random enemy. NL #yEvoke: Removes all #yGrowing #yPain ( [REMOVE_SPACE]#b{1} [REMOVE_SPACE]) and deals that much damage to ALL enemies.
